wiki.text:
'IRB' may refer to:

in 'organizations':
* International Rugby Board, the governing board of rugby union
* Irish Republican Brotherhood, an Irish secret revolutionary society of the
  19th and early 20th centuries
* Institutional review board, a committee to monitor research involving humans
* Immigration and Refugee Board of Canada, a Canadian administrative tribunal
* Ruđer Bošković Institute (Croatian: Institut Ruđer Bošković), a Croatian
  research institute
* IRB Infrastructure, an Indian road infrastructure company
* Instituto de Resseguros do Brasil, a Brazilian company of reinsurance
* Instituto Ricardo Brennand, a museum in Recife, Brazil

in 'technology':
* Interactive Ruby Shell, a shell for programming in Ruby
* ASEA IRB, an industrial robot

'Other':
* Inflatable Rescue Boat
* Internal Ratings-Based Approach (Credit Risk), an approach to estimate capital
  requirements by banks under the Basel II guidelines
wiki.title: IRB
